claim_card.claim: Common explanations of AI are characterized as linear and mechanistic: training as backpropagation of token weights and inference as step-by-step computation.
claim_card.test_hook: Audit 20 popular explainers; classify whether they primarily use backprop + stepwise-computation metaphors.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Training is described as back-propagation of token weights; inference is presented as step-by-step computation.
